com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.provisioning.service.auth

Class ProvisioningConnectionString

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.provisioning.service.auth.ProvisioningConnectionStringBuilder
      • com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.provisioning.service.auth.ProvisioningConnectionString

  • public class ProvisioningConnectionString
extends ProvisioningConnectionStringBuilder
    Expose all connections string properties and methods for user, device and connection string serialization.
